  • Method Details

    • setTasks

      public void setTasks(int tasks)
      Sets the tasks that should be performed during export. The value should be a combination of flags such as RdfSerializer.TASK_STATEMENTS.
      Parameters:
      tasks - the tasks to be performed

    • getTasks

      public int getTasks()
      Returns the tasks that should be performed during export. The value should be a combination of flags such as RdfSerializer.TASK_STATEMENTS.
      Returns:
      tasks to be performed
